title: How to Text a Gemini Man: 11 Tips to Attract Him

steps.title: A Gemini guy usually enjoys talking about himself, so get him to open up.
steps.content: A Gemini guy usually enjoys talking about himself, so get him to open up. Ask about places he's traveled, his interests, or what he's currently passionate about. These kinds of texts are also a great way to get a conversation going. [1] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. You could text, "What 3 places are on your dream travel list?" or, "What was your least favorite class in school?" Keep texting questions back and forth. Think of this as a lightning-fast way to get to know each other.

steps.title: A Gemini man loves it when someone is witty and bold.
steps.content: A Gemini man loves it when someone is witty and bold. This is because Geminis don't do subtle! You might feel like you're coming on strong, but if you do it in a way that's smart, you'll make him curious about you. steps.title: There's a lot to love about Geminis and he wants to hear about it!
steps.content: There's a lot to love about Geminis and he wants to hear about it! Flattery really does go a long way in making a Gemini man interested in you. Send a sweet compliment so he knows what you like about him. [4] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. steps.title: It's easy for Geminis to get bored, so keep him interested.
steps.content: It's easy for Geminis to get bored, so keep him interested. One way to do this is to ask him out at the last minute to do something fun. He'll love that you're spontaneous! [5] X Research source For example, text him, "Let's go do paintball! Are you free right now?" or, "Have you ever gone kayaking on the lake? I want to take you out!"

steps.title: Your Gemini will love if you send him a message that catches him off guard.
steps.content: Your Gemini will love if you send him a message that catches him off guard. You might text him plans that you've made for the two of you, send him a picture of you doing something crazy, or just surprise him with a ridiculous fun fact. He'll appreciate anything that makes him laugh, smile, or think for a minute. For instance, text him, "I hope you don't have plans this weekend. You know that sold-out concert? Guess who got tickets!" Or, send him a picture of you getting your hair dyed a ridiculous color along with the message, "Thoughts? üòõ"

steps.title: Geminis are good problem solvers, so he'll love to give his advice.
steps.content: Geminis are good problem solvers, so he'll love to give his advice. This is because he can usually see all sides of a situation. Plus, he'll realize that you thought he could help you out and this makes him feel great, especially if you compliment him when you ask. [6] X Research source For example, text him something like, "You always know the best restaurants in town. Where should I go for Vietnamese food?" Try texting something like, "I want to take a language class. What language do you think would be the most useful to learn?" This can spark a whole conversation!

steps.title: Your Gemini guy wants to know that you have your own life.
steps.content: Your Gemini guy wants to know that you have your own life. He's a friendly guy and he expects you to have your own social life, so give him a glimpse. You might text that you're going to a club or meeting with friends. He'll see that you have your own life and he'll find that he's curious about it. [7] X Research source Keep the texts about your social plans brief so he wonders what you're up to. For example, if he asks what your plans are for the night, text back, "Going out with co-workers. steps.content: Describe a fantasy or send a racy photo to drive your Gemini guy crazy. Remember, Geminis thrive with stimulation, so if you send a dirty text, he won't be able to stop thinking about you. You might describe what you're wearing or imagine what will happen the next night you spend together. steps.title: Geminis like a little space, so don't reply immediately.
steps.content: Geminis like a little space, so don't reply immediately. You don't want to wait days either, but give a little time before you respond to him. This gives him some time to wonder what you might be up to. It also shows that you're not clingy and waiting for his texts. Try to match his texting style when you do reply. For example, if he texts you a brief, "How's it going?" do not text back a paragraph. Instead, keep it short, too. Think of this ask matching his communication style so he feels comfortable.

steps.title: Your Gemini guy is known for being lighthearted, so avoid heavy subjects.
steps.content: Your Gemini guy is known for being lighthearted, so avoid heavy subjects. This isn't to say that you can't ever talk about serious topics, but it might be better to do it in person. Save your texts for fun, flirty communication and he'll love you for it. Pay attention to his responses. If you've touched on a topic that he doesn't want to discuss, he may go quiet and you won't get a text back from him. Don't panic! Just try a totally different topic and see if he replies.
